quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"kuiper"形近联想为"keeper"（守护者），或因"belt"的日常含义（腰带/皮带）误判为日常用品相关概念
quiz_item.sentence: Scientists believe many short-period comets, such as Halley's Comet, originate from the **kuiper belt**, a region beyond Neptune filled with icy bodies.

option.definition: 太阳系边缘海王星以外的冰质天体带（柯伊伯带）
